abstract: One of Intel’s chief advantages is that Microsoft’s MS-DOS operating system will be booting on the teraflop Intel microprocessor in every personal computer of the future. Intel beleives that because it has always believed in backward compatibility. In the world of handhelds and smartphones, that may not be enough of a margin.
snippet: One of Intel’s chief advantages is that Microsoft’s MS-DOS operating system will be booting on the teraflop Intel microprocessor in every personal computer of the future. Intel beleives that because it has always believed in backward compatibility...
lead_paragraph: Intel’s 40th anniversary is July 18 and the world’s largest chip maker is making a big bet on the past.
